sentences.en: A passenger was injured so badly he will be paraplegic for the rest of his life.
sentences.cn: 一位乘客受了重伤，后半生都将下身瘫痪。

sentences.en: As a learner rider you must not carry a pillion passenger.
sentences.cn: 作为摩托车初学者，切勿后座载人。

sentences.en: Each passenger is allowed twenty - five kilogrammes of luggage.
sentences.cn: 每位旅客允许携带二十五公斤的行李.

sentences.en: Each passenger slept on the berth allotted to him.
sentences.cn: 每个旅客都睡在分配给他的铺位上.

sentences.en: His car has a bullet lodged in the passenger door.
sentences.cn: 他的车在客座位的门上嵌着一颗子弹。

sentences.en: Most of our flights have a baggage allowance of 44lbs per passenger.
sentences.cn: 我们大多数航班行李限重为每位乘客44磅。

sentences.en: Neither the driver nor the passengers were hurt.
Oliver filched a packet of cigarettes from a well - dressed passenger.
sentences.cn: 奥立佛从一名衣冠楚楚的乘客身上偷得一包香烟.

sentences.en: Passenger services can best be described as skeletal.
sentences.cn: 对乘客的服务已经少到不能再少。

sentences.en: The airline was accused of playing Russian roulette with passenger safety.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司被指责将乘客安全当儿戏。

sentences.en: The driver drop ped a passenger at Dalian.
sentences.cn: 司机让一乘客在大连下车.

sentences.en: The passenger ship was two hours late.
The ticket was handed back to the passenger.
They launched a new passenger liner.
sentences.cn: 他们使一艘新的客轮下水.

sentences.en: They wrenched open the passenger doors and jumped into her car.
sentences.cn: 他们使劲拽开后座车门，跳进了她的车子。

sentences.en: When the car had pulled level with him, he had spoken into the lowered passenger window.
sentences.cn: 汽车开到他身边与他并行时，他朝拉下车窗的后排座位说了几句话。

words.tran_cn: 过路人；旅客；考试合格者

phrases.tran_cn: 客机；载客飞机，旅客输送机
客运服务；旅客服务；客运航班
客船，客轮；邮船；医务船，医院船
客运，旅客流量；旅客运输
客运列车，旅客列车；客车
客车，客运车辆；载客车辆

trans.tran_en: someone who is travelling in a vehicle, plane, boat etc, but is not driving it or working on it
